descriptionHtml:
Name: Dawnstar House
Version: Beta
Date: 2/13/2012
Author(s): antonkr

Description
===========
This mod adds Dawnstar housing to Skyrim. I felt like this bare snowy town had no retreat for Dragonborn so I decided to make this rather comfortable cabin for you to enjoy. The cabin includes a warm bed, a nice bookshelf to store all your books at,  a fireplace for your cooking, and a alchemy table for all your potion and poison making needs.  

Location
========
The location of the house is right across from Khajiit tents a little bit outside of Dawnstar


Install (without NMM)
=======
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
2. Check to make sure that it\'s activated

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the .esp file from \\Skyrim\\Data\\
Make sure that you have all your stuff from the house if you do decide to uninstall. 


Incompatibility
===============
The only known incompatability is if you are running Expanded Villages by Shade04rek, which has a house in the same spot. 

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Navmesh is currently a bit buggy outside, but your companions should still be able to walk in and walk out of the house.

History
=======
Beta, February 13th 2012 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
If you have any issues please contact me through PM on Nexus, or email me. 

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
author: antonkr
